Investor_15_pre_2.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have maintained transparency and fairness, actively engaging in clear dialogue to ensure equitable profit distribution while protecting my interests. My commitment to a collaborative approach has bolstered trust between myself and the trustee. As a result, my reputation is strong, characterized by reliability, trustworthiness, and pro-social tendencies.
